node.title: Forever a Student
node.description:
Students at Seventh-day Adventist Christian schools enjoy significant advantages when compared to other schools in North America. In this morning’s message we explore the spiritual principles behind holistic education – and how we can each enjoy these advantages as well, whether we’re nine years old or ninety.

 

To watch the video which was played during the message, go to http://vimeo.com/51465571.
